Trigonometric regression Filter

Source: R/07-filter.R
filter_tr.Rd

This function computes the cyclical component of the trigonometric regression filter.

filter_tr(x, ...)

Arguments

x

[univariate vector]

Univariate vector, numeric or ts object with only one dimension.
...

Further arguments passed to trfilter.

Examples

# \donttest{
x <- cumsum(rnorm(100))
fx <- filter_tr(x)
fx

#>   [1]  2.1359454440 -0.3743631394 -0.4173901196  0.0464666921 -0.9006889615
